title: Ticket #3413: condor_q shows jobs grouped by dag even when -dag is not specified.
description:
condor_q puts all jobs into a dag_map as the come off the wire, then prints them out in map order. The dag_map is ordered first by ATTR_DAGMAN_JOB_ID and then by cluster and proc, so even when -dag is not specified, all of the jobs in a dag are printed out right after the dagman job.

instead, jobs should be sorted only be cluster and proc when -dag is not specified.
remarks:
